name: Punchball
description:
This game is your standard pinball sim, but pulling back the plunger is replaced with readying up for a punch. This means you can yeet the ball anywhere, as long as you have good aim. Just don't get stuck in the launch tube.

You can also save your final score to a leaderboard and compete with others on the same device for the highest score in each category. If you wanna post it online, get a vid of the run or such.

This game is meant to be played with a touchpad, so you get the feel of pulling back the plunger on a pinball machine and launching it.

I'll probs add a windows Player into the .zip later, but not now. The saves will be in ~/.config/AGKApps/Punchball/media, and if they break, just delete them.

Made with AGK Classic. Is free on raspberry pi so if you got one lying around use it. Make sure to use a 32 bit pi because they don't got a 64 bit pi version.
